name: Laser Pointer
description:
You are a sapient robot working for a technology company experimenting with a new type of laser. Powering up after a night of charging, you find yourself trapped in an ever-expanding set of hallways, and the only way out is to use conveniently placed mirrors to direct the laser beam to a sphere-like target device. But be careful, you have a limited charge!

Created for the Mirror Game Jam. Future development is possible, if people like this, but I make no guarantees.
